Reviews.Title: This computer is very sleek
Reviews.Author: D. H.
Reviews.Content: I got this computer so I can do some work on the road. I have an older HP and always liked the design. This new one is very sleek looking and is very fast. Although I agree with the design with the arrow buttons, it isn't a big deal to me because I don't use them that often. The battery life on mine is very good. I can use this laptop for a good 3-4 hours before it needs to be plugged in again. I have taken it out on the road several times and have had to log on to public wi fi with no problems at all. I have been in situations where I couldn't plug it in, and have been able to get all my work done while just sitting having coffee in a fast food place or coffee shop. This is a great lap top for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great value and great features for the prive
Reviews.Author: Willard K.
Reviews.Content: This is competitively priced and offers a lot of features in a very thin and easily portable format.  I like the full QWERTY keyboard with the calculator stype numeric keypad on the rightside. HP made a good compromise by dropping the internal optical drive to keep the size small.I found the need for an external optical drive only a minor inconvenience as most media and softwares are downloadable.  This comes loaded with Windows 8 - not everyone's cup of tea

Reviews.Title: 1. Touchpad doesn't work; 2. Poor support
Reviews.Content: When you purchase a computer, you buy a whole package. The tech support is an important part of the package. In my experience, the HP support was a big disappointment.My new laptop was sleek and beautiful indeed, but the touchpad didn’t work.  So I googled and read the forum and tried to fix it myself. I reset the machine, re-configured touchpad driver, updated Bios, but nothing worked. Based on my research, it seems the touchpad problem is common (then why didn’t HP fix it?).So I contacted the HP support assistant for help. The first technician (his name is Azhar) closed my case while I was still typing and left me flabbergasted. I still remembered the last sentence I typed was, “Wait, what about the mouse app you just asked me to open?” I lost the chat with the second technician after he (or she) instructed me to restart the laptop. He said he would wait for me for 5-7 minutes and I should come back to continue the chat with him. The restart process took more than 5 minutes. So I lost him. The third technician was nice and told me he would definitely help me to fix the problem. But I lost the communication with him too after a hard reset and problem was still not fixed.I went through three technicians in three hours. I politely greeted and answered the same questions over and over again. I told them what the previous tech asked me to do and the tasks that were unfinished. Each one of them ignored what I said and asked me to do different things. The first technician didn’t even have an idea on how the touchpad supposed to work.I liked the look and price of the laptop, so I ordered a replacement. The new one arrived in just two days, but the touchpad didn’t work either. I knew this is a minor issue and I just needed to do some minor adjustment to get it going. Since the HP support assistant was non-responsive on the replacement. I download the software from HP and got their phone number and called them this time.  It took me about 10-15 minutes to finally talk to a real person. He asked me to keep tapping the touchpad on/off switch until it worked. I tried multiple times but it didn’t work. Then the reception got terrible and I lost the communication, AGAIN. I have never had a bad reception in my house, but I guess I do if the call was routed to India.I decided to return the replacement and I will never buy another HP product again due to its poor support.

Reviews.Title: Great mid tier laptop with light gaming....
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Lightweightsmallnot quite a sleekbook but much slimmer then standardDoes not overheat when I play Skyrim or Star Trek Online

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Ann from Pgh.
Reviews.Content: One morning I got up and opened the computer and the screen was damaged.  I called their help line and described the damages and they said I must have pinched it when I closed it.  Nothing can be seen on the screen at all..just a bunch of lines and a dark spot in the corner.  They told me that kind of damage is not covered in the warranty.  I have only had the computer 2 months.  For them to fix it was almost as much as I paid for the computer.  I have owned 3 Dell computers and never had a problem with screens.  Perhaps I did unknowingly damage it but it must be a very fragile screen.  I think I will stick with Dells from now on.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for not being a mac
Reviews.Author: Heather Moody "Heat"
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop for the price.  I am a mac person but can't afford new one.  Windows 8 is cumbersome.

Reviews.Title: SUPER PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: P. Norman Walls "Norm"
Reviews.Content: This was ordered as a gift, and I almost kept it for myself.  The speed of this unit is awesome. Very sturdily built - but I expected that from an HP product.

Reviews.Title: Love it a lot!
Reviews.Author: Thu H Nguyen
Reviews.Content: First, I want to give a compliment to Amazon for offering this product at a lower price than the market. Second, I love this computer for its stylish look and great quality. The computer is lightweight and perform very fast. I had no problem with connecting to the Internet. It also comes with Windows 8, which I like a lot.

Reviews.Title: Wow I am very impressed with this laptop so far.
Reviews.Author: Michael Smith "Smallville Addict"
Reviews.Content: Would Highly recommend getting one of these to my friends. Easy to use and easy to connect. Packaging was very good as well. TWO THUMBS UP! - Michael Smith - TN

Reviews.Title: Sleek book
Reviews.Author: Debbie Pederson
Reviews.Content: Nice product very thin. Very light weight has windows 8 installed will have to learn how to use that more effectively

Reviews.Title: bought for a friend
Reviews.Author: MeltingAway
Reviews.Content: He really likes it. He's not a computer geek or expert or anything. Most for documents, web surfing and email. Does the job.

Reviews.Title: Works good so far...
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Have had this product for a few months.  No issues, am disappointed there is no disk drive, but other than that it serves its purpose. It's lightweight and has great screen.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Elaine Bohman
Reviews.Content: I needed something simple for going back to school. I only want to use this for homework and Netflix. I downloaded microsoft products to write papers. It's perfect for school. I did, however, delete the Netflix "card" on the microsoft 8 wall. That link didn't work (the movie would stop after 30 seconds) however going through the internet works great!  It's perfect for no thrills usage and easy to use. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Love this computer!
Reviews.Author: Luis Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a touch screen laptop for a while now. Saw this one and the same day I went and bought it. I am very pleased with it. I wasn't sure if I would like the windows 8 but I actually really enjoy it. It is very easy to understand and use. Especially with the touch screen. The touch screen makes all difference as I don't think I would have liked Windows 8 otherwise. The touch screen and the touch pad both respond really well. This computer is also very fast. From what I have noticed also the sound is also pretty good. Don't really have any complaints about this computer. Possibly the only complaint is that it doesn't have a cd drive but I can always get an external drive so that isn't such a big issue. I would definitely recommend this computer if someone is on a budget and wants a touch screen.About the keyboard, another reviewer mention he didn't keyboard's enter and arrow keys layout, I disagree.  The keys feel and look great.  What I like about the arrows keys is the right and left arrow keys are as big as standard size keys. I have another laptop and all the arrow keys are small.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: aly bryant
Reviews.Content: I was up set to have my laptop for a short period of time and windows 8 program already crashed now I have to pay 100$ before I can even use it!

Reviews.Title: Already experiencing problems
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Odette "Lady Rider"
Reviews.Content: The Good:  Right out of the box, this computer fulfilled all of my expectations.The Bad:  After less than 2 months, it needed to be sent in for repair.The Ugly:  Read "The Bad"; really????  Less than 2 months????

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion Sleekbook 15-b120us 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Wayne Oosterhoff
Reviews.Content: I like the machine real well, but I needed one with an optical drive.  My mistake when ordering.  Thanks for so receptive on the return.

Reviews.Title: Internal design is terrible
Reviews.Author: Joe Stacavich
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop if you just want to use it as is and be done with it. It is fairly fast and light, not too cheap feeling.However, I did a RAM upgrade on this laptop for a colleague and the internal design could not be more complicated. You practically have to disassemble the whole thing and take the motherboard off to get the the RAM slots.Just something to think about for those considering this one. I was able to do the upgrade but it was no 20 minute job. There is no door on the back like most laptop for changing the RAM.

Reviews.Title: Bad keyboard
Reviews.Author: Flavio
Reviews.Content: About the keyboard, bad layout on "Enter" key and "Arrow" keys, and it works like a tv remote control with low batteries. It's a worst choice to buy.

Reviews.Title: My Hp Slimbook
Reviews.Author: Sonrifoto
Reviews.Content: Extremely happy with laptop purchased, amazed to see how light it is. I am very happy with quality of the pc, easy to use. BEAUTIFUL, CRYSTAL CLEAR DISPLAY. THANKS.
